MATHEMATICS /STATISTICS EDUCATION  
MAKURDI    
EKSU    
  
  
STATISTICS EDUCATION  
   (xi) TASUED does not accept Agricultural Science as Science 
subject  
(xii)CRUTECH requires 'O' level credit passes in Physics and 
either Chemistry or Biology.  
(xiv) UNIOSUN and AAUA also require 'O' level credit pass 
in Physics.  
(xv) UMYUK requires five (5) credit passes including English 
Language, Mathematics and any other three (3) 
subjects preferably Further Mathematics, Physics, 
Chemistry, Biology, AgriculturalScience or Computer 
Studies.  
(xvi) LASU requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in 
EnglishLanguage, Mathematics, Physics plus three (3) 
of Biology, Chemistry, Geography, Physics, and 
Economics  
(xvii) MAUTY requires  
(a) five (5) 'O' level credit passes in the relevant subjects 
including, English and Mathematics.  
(b) Grade II Teachers' Certificate merit in five (5) 
relevantsubjectsincluding English and Mathematics.  
(xviii) TASUED requires five(5) 'O' level credits at one 
(1)sitting or six (6) 'O' level credit passes at two (2) 
sittings to include English Language, Mathematics, and 
two (2) subjects from Biology, Physics, Statistics, 
Chemistry, Further Mathematics, Economics 
ANDGeography/Physics  
(xviv) CALABAR requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any two  
(2) of Chemistry, Biology and AgriculturalScience  
(xx) BAYERO requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes  to 
include English language, Mathematics plus three (3) 
other Science subject.  
(xxi) OAU requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes which 
must include English Language, Mathematics, Physics 
or Chemistry and any other two (2) subjects.  
(xxii) IAUED – Same as in Computer Education.  
(xxiii) GOUU requires three (3) other Science subjects.
